content.introduction: Our home renovation services are designed to transform your living spaces into beautiful, functional environments that reflect your personal style and meet your practical needs.

sections.title: Full Home Renovation
sections.content: From concept to completion, we handle every aspect of full home renovations, ensuring a seamless process and outstanding results.

sections.title: Specialized Renovations
sections.content: Whether you're looking to update your kitchen, bathroom, or add an extension, our team brings expertise and attention to detail to every project.

featuredProjects.title: Victorian Home Modernization
featuredProjects.description: A complete renovation of a Victorian property, blending period features with contemporary design

featuredProjects.title: Luxury Kitchen Transformation
featuredProjects.description: A kitchen renovation featuring bespoke cabinetry and high-end appliances

testimonials.quote: Sovran Group transformed our outdated home into a modern masterpiece. Their attention to detail and project management skills were exceptional.
testimonials.author: James Wilson

testimonials.quote: The kitchen renovation exceeded our expectations. The team was professional, punctual, and delivered a stunning result within our budget.
testimonials.author: Olivia Thompson

testimonials.quote: From planning to completion, Sovran Group handled our extension project with expertise. The new space blends seamlessly with the original house.
testimonials.author: Michael Harris

processSteps.title: Initial Consultation
processSteps.description: We discuss your renovation goals, budget, and timeline to understand your vision.

processSteps.title: Design & Planning
processSteps.description: Our design team creates detailed plans and visualizations of your renovation project.

processSteps.title: Permitting & Approval
processSteps.description: We handle all necessary permits and approvals to ensure compliance with regulations.

processSteps.title: Construction
processSteps.description: Our skilled craftsmen execute the renovation with precision and attention to detail.

processSteps.title: Final Inspection & Handover
processSteps.description: A thorough quality check ensures everything meets our high standards before project completion.

content.introduction: At Sovran Interiors, we specialize in creating bespoke rooms tailored to your specific needs and aesthetic preferences. Each room is thoughtfully designed to maximize functionality while maintaining a cohesive style throughout your home.

sections.title: Design Process
sections.content: Our expert designers work closely with you to understand your vision, lifestyle, and requirements. We take into account every detail, from spatial planning to lighting, to create a room that exceeds your expectations.

sections.title: Materials & Craftsmanship
sections.content: We use only the finest materials and work with skilled craftsmen to ensure exceptional quality in every aspect of your bespoke room. From premium woods to designer hardware, every component is selected for its beauty and durability.

featuredProjects.title: Contemporary Family Room
featuredProjects.description: A sophisticated yet comfortable space designed for modern family living

featuredProjects.title: Luxury Home Cinema
featuredProjects.description: A state-of-the-art entertainment space with premium acoustics and comfortable seating

testimonials.quote: Sovran Interiors transformed our living space into a beautiful and functional area that perfectly matches our style.
testimonials.author: Robert Thompson

testimonials.quote: The attention to detail and craftsmanship in our bespoke room is extraordinary. We couldn't be happier with the results.
testimonials.author: Catherine Mitchell

testimonials.quote: From design to completion, Sovran made the process enjoyable and stress-free. The results exceeded our expectations.
testimonials.author: James Wilson

content.introduction: Our bespoke wardrobes are designed to provide elegant storage solutions while complementing your interior d√©cor. Each wardrobe is custom-built to optimize your space and accommodate your specific storage needs.

sections.title: Custom Solutions
sections.content: Whether you're looking for a walk-in wardrobe, fitted wardrobes, or a complete dressing room, our team will create a solution tailored to your requirements and available space.

sections.title: Interior Organization
sections.content: We offer a range of interior storage solutions, including hanging rails, shelving, drawers, and specialized compartments, ensuring that everything has its place.

content.introduction: Our luxury kitchens combine exceptional design with practical functionality, creating spaces that are as beautiful as they are functional. Each kitchen is meticulously planned to enhance your cooking experience and complement your lifestyle.

sections.title: Bespoke Design
sections.content: We design kitchens that reflect your personal style and meet your specific requirements, ensuring a perfect balance between aesthetics and functionality.

sections.title: Premium Materials
sections.content: From natural stone countertops to custom cabinetry, we use only the finest materials to create kitchens of unparalleled quality and durability.
